dmca.title: DMCA Copyright Infringement [ThePlanetAbuse-C3743600G]

-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2007 6:25 PM To: Copyright Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement [ThePlanetAbuse-C3743600G] This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for review and applicable action. Abuse Department The Planet ===================== Original Message ===================== X-MailFrom: marykfordellp@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue, 03 Apr 2007 21:24:37 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.82.159.3 with HTTP; Tue, 3 Apr 2007 21:24:37 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <4e0c13070704032124m5a1ec456pd44c8cbeacfdca9a@mail.gmail.com> Date: Tue, 3 Apr 2007 21:24:37 -0700 From: "Mary K. Forde" To: domains@celebritydirt.org, domains@cheapazhotels.com, abuse@theplanet.com Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_14434_21440586.1175660677427" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 66.249.92.172 as permitted sender) client-ip=66.249.92.172; envelope-from=marykfordellp@gmail.com; helo=ug-out-1314.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 Apr 2007 04:24:44.0870 (UTC) FILETIME=[2C398E60:01C77671] ------=_Part_14434_21440586.1175660677427 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Disposition: inline Dear Mr. John Blaze and The Planet Inc., I am an attorney for Bumpshack.com, a corporation of Mr. Joshua Stark published at http://www.bumpshack.com. This will put you on notice of a copyright infringement on your website, http://www.celebritydirt.org. This letter also is an official notification to you under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringements. Infringements of Bumpshack.com's published intellectual property have been detected in multiple locations on your website: http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/04/03/bumpcrack-links-74/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/04/02/ramblings-from-the-shack-edition -1/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/04/02/rosie-shows-her-butt-again/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/04/02/hollywood-march-madness-champion ship-match-brit-v-jacko/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/04/01/quote-of-the-day-unknown/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/03/30/bumpcrack-links-72/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/03/29/hollywood-final-four-madness-jac ko-v-rosie/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/03/28/will-sanjaya-actually-go-tonight / http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/03/28/bumpcrack-links-70/ http://www.celebritydirt.org/2007/03/27/alan-jouban-for-the-ladies/ Please immediately (TODAY) remove all of the infringing material and cease posting content from Bumpshack.com on your website in the future. Non-compliance may subject you to penalties and liability under the Copyright Act, and may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA. I have a good faith belief that the posting of this intellectual property on your website is not authorized by Bumpshack.com, its licensing representatives, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Bumpshack.com for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material. Please send to me at the address below a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter. Very truly yours, /s Mary K. Forde *Mary K. Forde* *K & K Publishing Law Partners, LLP* *PO Box** 564* *Lafayette**, **CA** **94549* *2109 Skycrest Drive, Suite #6*** *Lafayette**, **CA** **94595*** *t: (925) 938-9205* *marykfordellp@gmail.com* ------=_Part_14434_21440586.1175660677427 Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Disposition: inline
Dear Mr. John Blaze and The Planet Inc.,

Please immediately (TODAY) remove all of the infringing material and cease posting content from  Bumpshack.com on your website in the future.  Non-compliance may subject you to penalties and liability under the Copyright Act, and may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA.

I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Bumpshack.com for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

Very truly yours,

 

/s Mary K. Forde
